titleStmt.title: The holy harmony: or, a plea for the abolishing of organs and other musick out of the Protestant churches of Great Britain, and demolishing of superstitious and idolatrous monuments. With a plenary expression of the Parliaments piety, cities charity, countreys constancy.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Austin, and A. Coe,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
